feed.title: ToolJet Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.65.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Setting app themes default values on global settings by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10313 and https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10404
  • removed condition to create version from dev env only by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10247
  • Homepage Search Animation fix and DS Connection Typo Fix by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10347
  • Getting 403 error when using multiple apps of different workspace in different tabs (public-apps) by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10360
  • Exposing password in basic auth success request URL by @shah21 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10320
  • Added script for creation of release branch by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10372
  • Fix for public app not loading by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10378
  • Added rest of the REST API plugin basic auth fixes by @shah21 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10377
  • Updated "Test connection" text for datasource automation by @Mekhla-Asopa in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10380

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.65.0...v2.65.1

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.65.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fixed alignment issue in plugins by @rohanlahori in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10422, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10426 and https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10446
  • New loading state UI by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10381
  • Loading State UI fix by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10427

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.65.1...v2.65.2

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.67.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Group permission revamp by @rudeUltra, @kriks7iitk , @vjaris42 and @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10262, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10331, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10361, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10401, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10586, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10595, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10780, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9534, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9687, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10036, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10389, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10215, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10807, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10818

  • [improvement] New onboarding flow by @shah21 and @rohanlahori in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10746, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10788, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10819, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10781, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10809

  • CVE - [High and critical issues + security improvements] by @shah21 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10288

  • [CVE] Smtp by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10603

  • Feature: Secret constants + Bug fixes for resolution of constants and secrets by @AnantshreeChandola in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10551

  • Automation changes for group permission revamp by @ajith-k-v in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10502, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10504, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10625

  • Email service modularisation by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10575

  • Search bar loading bug by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10618

  • User Data fix on version change by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10468

  • Updated nav links for workspace settings by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10556

  • New add plugins UI by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10538
  • Feature/autofill workspaceslug using workspace name by @rohanlahori in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10432
  • enabled app sharing before release of app by @rohanlahori in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10483
  • fixed empty workspace slug issue by @rohanlahori in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10690

  • Fix for connection initialisation by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10668

  • [platform-release-fixes] Release branch import errors & onboarding app issues by @shah21 in

  • Minor fixes and improvements by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10784

  • Added type to folder by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10785, https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10786

  • [Fix] Archived user SSO signup and login by @shah21 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10787

  • Fix for change ownership of app on role change by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10791

  • Platform Release 19.2 Bugs by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10794

  • workspace slug changes fix by @rohanlahori in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10801

  • Fix permission check in constants controller by @AnantshreeChandola in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10803
  • handled redirection for subpaths by @rohanlahori in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10804
  • Workspace Constant CE Bug Fixes by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10811
  • market place page ui fix by @rohanlahori in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10817
  • lint fixes by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10821
  • Release PR [CVE + Group Permissions] by @kriks7iitk in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10579

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.66.2...v2.67.0

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.20.3

  • Fix datepicker default value not updating on enabling time selection

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.20.4
